TopicDetails.title: Business Aviation / Short Regional TP demonstrator - Advanced Power & Accessory Gear Box
TopicDetails.callTitle: Clean Sky 2 Call for Core Partners Wave 2
TopicDetails.description:
Specific Challenge:

The core partner will be responsible for the detailled design, manufacturing & partial testing of the Power & Accessory Gear Box (PAGB). He will deliver 2 PAGB demonstrators parts to be tested at Turbomeca Propeller Engine ground test facility.
TopicDetails.conditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. Please check carefully the Full Topic Descriptions
     
  2. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in Part A of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in parts B & C of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  4. Evaluation

    4.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold:
            Described in part F of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    4.2 Rules for submission and evaluation: 
           Clean Sky 2 Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of calls for Core Partners
     
  5. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template in the submission system.
     
  6. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  7. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    Clean Sky 2 Innovation Action (CS2-IA)
    Specific provisions and funding rates (See Part D of the General Annexes)
    Standard proposal templates will be available for download in the submission system
    Standard evaluation form
    Clean Sky 2 JU Model Grant Agreement for Members
     
  8. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  9.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment
TopicDetails.supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CPW-2015-01@Cleansky.EU

Clean Sky 2 States Representative Group Contact Points - http://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/h2020/other/guides_for_applicants/jtis/h2020-srg-cleansky-ju_en.pdf

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
TopicDetails.sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.

callDetailsJSONItem.staticAdditionalInfo: This is the second call for core partners for Clean Sky 2.

latestInfos.content: On the 3rd of July the third release of the Questions & Answers document was added to this web site. See under the "Call Documents" tab.
On 19th June the second release of the Questions & Answers document was added to this web site. See under the "Call Documents" tab.

On 5th June the first release of the Questions & Answers document was added to this web site. See under the "Call Documents" tab.  A link to the H2020 Annotated Model Grant agreement was also added.

As a reminder, please note that in May the States Representative Group Contact List was updated in the "Get Support" section. If you do not see "May 2015" in the header of this document then the previous version is still cashed in your internet browser and you need to clear it (e.g. in MS-Internet Explorer press crtl + F5).

As a reminder, please note also that on 7 May 2015 there were minor updates made to the following topic description: JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-03-02 "Reduced Cockpit Workload," under section “Special skills, Capabilities, Certification expected from the Applicant(s)” (see pp. 56, main bullet points 9 and 11). Please see version 2 of the Annex IV (Topic Documents Document) for further details.

Please be assured that all relevant questions that have been received via the call mailbox (see the "Get Support" tab) are being reviewed and the first issue of the Questions & Answers document will be published on this web site around the end of May / beginning of June.

The States Representative Group Contact List has also been updated in the "Get Support" section. If you do not see "May 2015" in the header of this document then the previous version is still cashed in your internet browser and you need to clear it (e.g. in MS-Internet Explorer press crtl + F5).

As a reminder, please note also that on 7 May 2015 there were minor updates made to the following topic description: JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-03-02 "Reduced Cockpit Workload," under section “Special skills, Capabilities, Certification expected from the Applicant(s)” (see pp. 56, main bullet points 9 and 11). Please see version 2 of the Annex IV (Topic Documents Document) for further details.

If you viewed

The submission session is now available for: JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-AIR-01-03(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-AIR-02-05(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-AIR-02-06(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-AIR-02-07(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-AIR-02-08(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-ENG-01-04(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-ENG-01-05(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-ENG-01-06(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-ENG-01-07(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-01-07(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-03-01(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-03-02(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-LPA-03-03(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-REG-01-03(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-REG-02-02(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-SYS-02-02(CS2-IA), JTI-CS2-2015-CPW02-SYS-03-02(CS2-IA)
